law.catch_line: There is a Partnership for Workforce Quality Fund in the Department....

text.section: There is a Partnership for Workforce Quality Fund in the Department.
The Secretary shall manage and supervise the Fund.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to reversion under § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section:
The Department may use money in the Fund for:
grants to defray the cost of workforce training; and
administrative, actuarial, legal, and technical services for the Program.
Any investment earnings shall be credited to the Fund.
